tag_list: restaurant, technology, publishing, social-media, agency, digital-brand
overview:
Restaurant industry innovator and founder of Fastcasual.com, The Fast Casual Executive Summit and the Fast Casual Industry Council. A technology, web publishing, creative content producer and social media maven for the restaurant business.

Consulted with many industry leading brands like Starbuck’s, McDonalds, Sonic, Panera Bread, Camille’s Sidewalk Cafe, Genghis Grill, Daphne’s Greek Cafe and Mooyah to name a few.

Paul spends his time innovating social web and digital content via his new start up DigitalCoCo already considered a leading digital brand agency in the restaurant segment.

milestones.description: DigitalCoCo launched first social listening center for the restaurant business.  Focusing on consumer interactions with restaurants and hospitality organizations.
milestones.source_description: DigitalCoCo Develop SOCIAL INSIGHTS to Track Social Trends for Fast Casual Restaurants
